name: Rain Of Time
description:
Made for The Scratch Jam #1. 

The player finds a mystical pocket watch on the ground with the ability to slow down time. However the watch doesn't like it when it gets wet, and when it does it saps the life force from the user. (Basically just don't get wet for as long as you can.)

The watch's power will slowly decrease when being used, in which you must wait for it to recharge

Controls

A/D or Left/Right arrow keys to move
W or Up arrow to jump
S or Down arrow to crouch (it can also let you slide)
J or X to slow down time
